petitionerArgument.violatedCode: California Health and Safety Code Section 114192
petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Failure to maintain minimum hot water temperature of 120 degrees, resulting in unusable shower and sinks

rationale.issueDuration: Ongoing since November 23, 2022 through hearing date
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Both parties agreed water temperature was at least 13 degrees below minimum requirement, multiple temperature readings provided as evidence
rationale.impactAssessment: Significant impact on tenant's ability to use shower and sinks properly
